entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Smiths Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:17 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this morning with risk of freezing drizzle. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 9 this morning and minus 3 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning before morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 3 this evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries ending near noon then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
